Tutorials

Tutorials for learning how to use Mars.

How to create a MoleculeArchive

Skill level: Beginner. Learn the basic elements of Mars by creating and working with a MoleculeArchive.

Introduction to groovy scripting

Skill level: Intermediate. Learn how to access and perform basic operations with MoleculeArchives.

Advanced groovy scripting

Skill level: Advanced. Learn advanced approaches to filter, collect, and report characteristics of MoleculeArchive records.
